node.title: 'Kind and funny': Family pay tribute to UK woman who died after falling from a mechanical bronco
node.description: The woman died after suffering a cardiac arrest.
node.content: ["The family of a woman who died after falling from a mechanical bucking bronco have paid tribute to her as being \"beautiful and kind\".\u00a0", "Jessica Lally, 26, died after she suffered a cardiac arrest when she fell from a mechanical bull at the American-themed Bronco's Rodeo bar in Sheffield, England in October last year.\u00a0 \u00a0\u00a0", "Her mother, Joan, described the death of her daughter as \"heartbreaking\" and said \"sometimes we still fall into pieces\", the Daily Mail reported.\u00a0", "\"She was in the Bronco Bar and she went on the ride and fell off and had a cardiac arrest,\" she said.", "\"She was just on a night out. She'd not had a lot to drink. They'd been for a meal actually and they called in there afterwards.", "\"I don't know why she decided to go on it. She was just having fun I suppose.", "\"She'd just gone out for a night out and then we had police at the door at midnight. We're still going through it now. Sometimes we still fall into pieces. It's been heartbreaking.\"", "Her family have now campaigned to buy defibrillators for the local area, which was inspired by a visit to their local football team.\u00a0", "\"I went down to Rotherham United and the ambulance service were showing me how to use the defibrillator and, knowing that they were trying to do that with Jessica, it caught my imagination,\" she said.", "\"I thought 'what a brilliant idea' because we haven't really got any locally. It's important, it's a matter of life and death sometimes, it can save somebody's life.\"", "The fundraiser has raised just over $20,000 while Lally's cousin, Michael Noone, has planned to run 26 half marathons in 12 weeks - one for every year Jessica lived.\u00a0", "Lally had planned to get married later in the year and had \"her whole life ahead of her\".", "\"She was such a beautiful girl, so kind and funny,\" Joan said.", "\"She'd got her whole life planned. They were going to get married.", "\"She always wrote these fantastic Christmas lists, but that year she'd just put: a house, a ring and a baby.\""]
